attributes.action: Make it illegal to call any one a racists or islamophobic if they have an opinion regarding Niqab, Islamic extremist or immigration.
attributes.additional_details: It has become impossible to express a negative opinion about the Niqab, Islamic extremist or immigration without being called a racist or islamophobic. If it was illegal to be called racist or islamophobic in these instances we would be able to have a proper debate about them.
